import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; import { Broadcast, Bell, Timer, Waveform, MapPin, FileText } from 'lucide-react'; import Skeleton from '../components/Skeleton'; const API_URL = process.env.REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL || ''; const AccountPage = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); const [metrics, setMetrics] = useState(null); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { fetch(`${API_URL}/api/metrics`) .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => { setMetrics(data); setLoading(false); }) .catch(() => setLoading(false)); }, []); const alerts = [ { id: 1, type: 'feature', title: 'NEW_FEATURE: HUB_ANALYTICS', desc: 'ADVANCED_TRANSMISSION_METRICS ARE NOW LIVE FOR PREMIUM ENTITIES.', time: '09:12_UTC', priority: true }, { id: 2, type: 'maintenance', title: 'MAINTENANCE_DOWNTIME', desc: 'REGION_LAGOS NODES WILL UNDERGO ENCRYPTION UPDATES ON FEB 28.', time: '24H_AGO', priority: false }, ]; return (
{/* Upper Section: Subscription & Alerts */}
{/* Subscription Panel */}
Stream_Active

CURRENT_PLAN

Premium
Broadcast

[PROTO_ID: PRM-BC-26]
{/* Alerts Panel */}

SYSTEM_ALERTS

{alerts.map(alert => (
{alert.priority &&
}

{alert.title}

{alert.desc}

{alert.time}

))}
{/* Lower Section: Metrics */}
{/* Metric 1: Broadcast Hours */}

BROADCAST_HOURS

{loading ? ( ) : ( 142.5 )}
+12.4% VS_PREV_CYCLE
{/* Metric 2: Signals Processed */}

SIGNALS_PROCESSED

{loading ? ( ) : ( {metrics?.stories_processed || 892} )}
AVG_28_PER_ROTATION
{[40, 60, 30, 80, 100, 50, 70].map((h, i) => (
))}
{/* Region Status */}

PRIMARY_REGION_STATUS

Lagos, NG

LAT: 6.5244 LON: 3.3792
HUB_LOAD {metrics?.network_load || '24%'}
{/* User Info Footer */} {user && (
{user.email?.[0]?.toUpperCase()}
{user.email} USER_ID: {user.id?.slice(0, 16)}
SESSION_ACTIVE // ENCRYPTION: AES-256-GCM
)}
); }; export default AccountPage;
